name: Sneeze Fire
description:
Dragon Niesfred is on his way to his audience with King Pepper.

Finally, a peace treaty!

Sadly, he is plagued by a terrible allergy to dust.
And whenever he sneezes ...

Make your way through the freshly swept but also slippery hallways without breaking too many of the king's prized posessions.

But also do not come too late to your audience with the king!

This game was created during the GMTK Game Jam 2020 to the theme out of control.
